description: Cotton Ink is a women’s retailer offering a range of trendy clothing that evoke confidence with simple yet stylish designs.
Cowork Latam works with real estate developers to finance the refurbishment of premier offices across the region.
Crepier produces stylish, high-quality handbags and luggage for travel and business, bringing affordable luxury to Peruvians.

Crezcamos is a Colombian microfinance institution (MFI) with an extensive rural network, offering financial services and insurance to unbanked farmers and merchants, thereby enabling them to increase their productivity and protect their livelihoods.
Crystel is an Outsourcing Service Provider offering a full range of customer service outsourcing solutions to global clients.
Cuatro Cabezas is an Argentine independent television producer.

Cubic Telecom is a global connectivity management software supplier that offers mobility solutions powering connectivity, including flexible over-the-air (OTA) device management, for leading IoT, automotive and mobile device companies in over 180 countries.
Cultura Colectiva is a social, mod movement that seeks to incorporate art and culture into people’s daily lives through new digital media.
Cyest is a technology consultancy that innovates and integrates industry-specific technology and superlative business systems to build the strongest possible value propositions for clients.
d.light distributes high-quality solar energy solutions to households and SMBs. With its proprietary “PayGo” technology, it offers mobile payment financing plans, making its solutions accessible.
DabaDoc is an online appointment booking platform for patients to find the doctor of their choice.
DANA is a digitial wallet all-in-one app that enables customers to safely make cashless and cardless payments for everyday needs such as offline purchases, mobile top ups, and bill payments.
Daniel Espinosa Jewelry is a jewelry and accessories brand in Mexico.

description: Data Appeal provides clients with Human Experience Intelligence, using its technology stack to monitor and interpret a unique blend of geographical data, online feedback, customer purchasing behaviors and trends worldwide.
Datamyne sells foreign trade information for companies. The company was acquired in 2016 by Descartes Systems Group Canada.
Dekoruma is a furniture and home decor marketplace with a platform which matches homeowners with over 2K+ interior designers that leverage Dekoruma’s real-time design platform.

DeliverLean empowers customers to eat well and live healthy lives. The company prepares and distributes nutrient-dense, gourmet meals and sells cold-pressed juices and raw vegan snacks at select retail locations nationwide.
Dermage develops, produces, and sells a full line of prescription and non-prescription skin and hair care products specifically designed for the Brazilian complexion.
Descomplica is a full-service ed-tech platform that transfers Brazil’s education system online.
Desinchá Dia makes a functional tea made from eight simple ingredients and sold in packages of 60 tea bags per box to help consumers create a new daily habit.
